Comment.Language: For the Feast of the Nativity:

Text.Language: All/louia (4) I/couc Pi,~rictoc Ps/ri m~V]: v/etaumacf qen B/yleem.
Alleluia (4). Jesus Christ the Son of God, who was born in Bethlehem.
الليلويا(4) يسوع المسيح ابن الله الذي ولد في بيت لحم.

Comment.Language: For the Feast of the Nativity:

Text.Language: Ouciou afsai qen nimansai: a~ nimagoc mosi n~cwf: san~tefe~nou e~ B/yleem: auouwst m~p~ouro n~nie~wn.
A star shone in the East: and the wise men followed it: until it brought them to Bethlehem: where they worshipped the King of the ages
نجم أشرق في المشارق والمجوس تبعوه حتي أدخلهم بيت لحم وسجدوا لملك الدهور.
All/louia (4) I/couc Pi,~rictoc Ps/ri m~V]: v/etaumacf qen B/yleem.
Alleluia (4) Jesus Christ the Son of God, who was born in Bethlehem.
الليلويا(4) يسوع المسيح ابن الله الذي ولد في بيت لحم.

Comment.Language: Another response to the Gospel may be chanted:

Text.Language: Po#c# m~p~wo~u aumou] e~rof n~o~S/ri: kata p~caji m~pete Iwann/c nau e~rof: pilogoc e~pie~w~nion af[icarx: Afi n~q~r/i n~q/ten ennau e~rof.
The Lord of Glory was called a Son / according to the words of John before he saw Him / the Eternal Logos took flesh / He dwelt among us and we saw Him
رب المجد دُعى ولدا: كقول يوحنا قبل أن يراه: الكلمة الازلى صار جسدا: وحل فينا ورأيناه.
All/louia (4) I/couc Pi,~rictoc Ps/ri m~V]: v/etaumacf qen B/yleem.
Alleluia (4) Jesus Christ the Son of God, who was born in Bethlehem.
الليلويا(4) يسوع المسيح ابن الله الذي ولد في بيت لحم.
